title: Kyler Murray, Cleveland Browns, and Antonio Brown
itunes:title: Kyler Murray, Cleveland Browns, and Antonio Brown
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb explains why the Kyler Murray experiment might work, the Cleveland Browns personality going forward, Oakland Raiders WR Antonio Browns injury, and what we should take from week 1 of the preseason. Guests include Antonio Cromartie, Danny Kanell, and Ben Volin. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
